directions: Lay the flatbreads on a work surface. Spread each with 2 tablespoons of the Chickpea Slather. Top each with 6 tomato halves, cut-side up, then sprinkle with a tablespoon of diced fennel. Top each with 6 olive halves, then sprinkle the parsley evenly over all. Serve on a decorative platter.
ingredients: 8 flatbreads or crisp breads (about 3x7 inches each)
1/2 cup finely diced fennel or celery
title: Summer Pizzas
